offlinechess

Class ChessBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • offlinechess.ChessBoard

  • public class ChessBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that represents a chess board

    • Field Summary

        public static int getColumn(java.lang.String s)
        Determines which column a square is referring to

        The columns are ordered as such:
        |_|_|_|_|_|_|_|_|
        |0 1 2 3 4 5 6 7
        |a b c d e f g h
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        which column the String is referring to

        public static java.lang.String shiftSquare(int col,
                                           int row,
                                           int colShift,
                                           int rowShift)
        Determines where a square is after a shift (a.k.a. moving it left and right, up and down)
        Parameters:
        col - current column
        row - current row
        colShift - how much to shift the columns
        rowShift - how much to shift the rows
        Returns:
        the shifted square

      • getResult

        public int getResult()
        Determines the result of the game, if finished.
        Returns:
        1 if white won, 0 if draw, -1 if black won. If not finished, returns 0.

      • setPerspective

        public void setPerspective(boolean b)

        Parameters:
